#### Control Structures

##### if-else

```R
if(x>0){
    y <- 1
} else {
    y <- 0
}
```

```R
y <- if(x >0){
    1   
} else {
    0
}
```

##### for loop

```R
for (i in 1:10){
    print(i)
}
```

create vector x

```R
x <- c('a', 'b', 'c', 'd')
```

```R
for (i in 1:4){
    print (x[i])
}
```

```R
for (i in 1:4) 
    print (x[i])
```

```R
for (i in 1:4) print (x[i])
```

```R
for (i in seq_along(x)){
    print (x[i])
}
```

```R
for (letter in x){
    print(letter)
}
```

create matrix

```R
m <- matrix(1:8, 2, 4)
```

```R
for(x in seq_len(nrow(m))){
    for(y in seq_len(ncol(m))){
        print(m[x,y])
    } 
}
```

```R
count <- 10
while(count>0){
    print(count)
    count <- count - 1
}
```
